Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
The Penn State Worry Questionnaire (PSWQ)


Instructions: Rate each of the following statements on a scale of 1 ("not at all typical of me") to 5 ("very typical of me"). Please do not leave any items blank.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. If I do not have enough time to do everything, I do not worry about it

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all typical of me 1 
 2, 2 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 
 5, Very typical of me 5

StructuredValue.Value: Not at all typical of me 1
Very typical of me 5

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all typical of me 1 
 2, 2 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 
 5, Very typical of me 5

StructuredValue.Value: Not at all typical of me 1
Very typical of me 5

 5, Very typical of me 5

Very typical of me 5
